price: À Allah [seul] appartient tout ce qui est dans les cieux et sur la terre. Et Allah suffit pour s’occuper de tout.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلًا

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wakafā bil-lahi wakīlan
